import React,{Component} from 'react'; class LoginForm extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={email:"", password:""} } emailHandler = (event)=>{ console.log(`${event.target.value}`) this.setState({email:event.target.value}) } passwordHandler = (event)=>{ console.log(`${event.target.value}`) this.setState({password:event.target.value}) } submitHandler = ()=>{ this.props.parentcallback(this.state) } render(props){ return(
) } } export default LoginForm;
